Unusual process execution patterns or be.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creation events. Analyze process command lines, parent-child relationships, and execution paths. Identify deviations from baseline behavior or known legitimate patterns. Look for correlation (e.g., time-based correlation) between suspicious processes and other host/network events.

Suspicious properties of executable file.Data: Zeek file.log, Zeek conn.log, Windows Event ID 4688
Suspicious properties of executable file.Action: Analyze Zeek file.log for executable file properties, specifically calculating entropy of file contents. Flag files with unusually high entropy values (e.g., > 0.9). Cross-reference flagged files with process creation events (Event ID 4688) and associated network connections (Zeek conn.log). Use descriptive statistics on entropy values to identify outliers.
